title: Ample privacy in a large and spacious apartment
posting_body: Please follow the link to view full 3D and application: <URL>
Three bedrooms available in a 5 bed 2 bath high quality Boston apartment!
Conveniently located between train and bus stops, 9 minute walk to the Roxbury Crossing Station, Walking distance to Stop & Shop, Dunkin' Donuts, shops, restaurants, Jamaica Pond, and multiple parks.
Flexible lease terms with only $400 security deposit and minimum of 3 month leases.

Very large rooms and common spaces
